extension.description: Store Locator Search Module - This module allows the displaying of a store locator search form

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module, this allows individual module styling

field.name: search_text
field.label: Search Text (Override)
field.description: Use this option to override the text that displays above the search box. Leave blank to use the default text.

field.name: search_text_before
field.label: Search Text Top
field.description: Use this option to add text that displays above the search area.

field.name: search_text_after
field.label: Search Text Bottom
field.description: Use this option to add text that displays below the search area.

field.name: mod_sl_itemid
field.label: Store Locator Itemid
field.description: Enter the Itemid of your Store Locator Map menu link. This will allow the module to link to the correct results page.

field.name: catsearch_enabled
field.label: Enable Category Search
field.description: Enable / Disable showing the category search filter dropdown option.

field.name: featsearch_enabled
field.label: Enable Featured Search
field.description: Enable / Disable showing the featured item search filter dropdown option.
